#summary How to use cooja collect-view plugin with other collect-view version

Open {{{~/contiki/tools/cooja/apps/collect-view/java/se/sics/se/cooja/plugins/collect-view.java}}}

Edit this line.

{{{String jarFile = contikiPath + "/tools/collect-view/dist/collect-view.jar";}}}


Then restart Cooja and open e.g. example-collect-view.csc
